Author: anxiety-and-theatre
Text: My mom once made me go to work with her (she’s a caregiver to an old couple) and I told her I didn’t want to go. She said there’ll be food. I said I didn’t want food and she said “you don’t have to eat anything”   I sat in a Burger King while a stroke victim waved fries at me saying “eeeeaaaaat” later he turned to me mom and stage whispered “Does she eat”  Thaaaaaanks
